title: 3.1 Master Challenge 2
question: Add a cube to the Workplane. Resize it to make a cuboid representing a minus (-) sign. Duplicate it and rotate the copy to make an addition (+) sign. Duplicate and rotate again to make a snowflake.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java
